attributes.action: Pick how long and when you want to go to School
attributes.additional_details: Children have increased boredom when they go in to school for the standard 6 hours of school and children would sit there not doing anything so if you would let the children learn when they want to they’d actually like learn more cause in the morning your awake happy and in the afternoon you’ll feel doom and gloom
attributes.background: Children would be able to pick and when they want to come in to school and how long they want school to be so then the students of that school can pick and choose when they want to go in to school and how long

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned that current school arrangements do not meet the needs of all students, but it's not clear if you want the Government to make attending school completely optional, or something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
